title: Level 23 vsing Masters in normals (fair match making RITO)

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Was teaching my friend how to play Kass on level 23 when I see us vsing 2 master ranked players FEELSBADMAN..

replies.body: Teaching him to play kass and goes 15/5/12 against master players? Either those fools boosted or you're the kassadin sensei of legend dude.

> [{quoted}](name=Jofeyy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tNUlosPI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-17T23:19:56.118+0000)
>
> Teaching him to play kass and goes 15/5/12 against master players? 

Pretty sure this is why the thread was made and OP just didn't want to make the bragging obvious, lol.
Or I wanted to show how BS the matchmaking is in normals? Who brags about winning normal games?

it's normals. master players want to have fun too. It isn't the system's fault that there wasn't currently another group that had a low level player in the group. And you won anyways. If they "fixed" it the way you wanted you'd probably have to wait much longer to find a game.

He destroyed that Karma. And you know that Master-tier jg Malz was camping midlane with that ult. 

Tell your boy to fly to Korea ASAP. SKT just got a new midlaner.

Also, first game and he already got that Lvl 5 Mastery. You and your boy going to dominate.

> [{quoted}](name=Jofeyy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tNUlosPI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-17T23:19:56.118+0000)
>
> Teaching him to play kass and goes 15/5/12 against master players? Either those fools boosted or you're the kassadin sensei of legend dude.

I worded it wrong, sorry.

I was the Kass on a smurf showing my friend what to do mid/late game since he was having trouble. That isn't really important though. It's stupid that 2 master players got matched with unranked not even level 30 players. The matchmaking in normals is horrendous and I think Riot should take rank in account for normals at least slightly. This is a big reason why low levels have a hard time leveling up and can definitely sway some players away. No one likes being stomped by players who are far superior. It's just not fun.

Also this Hecarim was also a smurf, so that also helped us win.

Not a fan of Riot lately, but it sounds like Riot got it right. A bunch of unranked smurfs trying to come in and stomp some noobs only for RIOT to be like "nah nah, we know what you are up to. We are going to throw in some Master-tier players to balance things out."
Ranked MMR vs Normal MMR is not the same. Not now not for the past 5 seasons either.

> [{quoted}](name=Zerolera,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tNUlosPI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-17T22:48:17.660+0000)
>
> Ranked MMR vs Normal MMR is not the same. Not now not for the past 5 seasons either.

Lmao ik this however level 23 vs 2 master players is pathetic
Agreed unfortunately what these players do a lot is surrender the game right before they win it thus ensuring that they can lower their MMR enough to play with people they can easily beat.

> [{quoted}](name=Zerolera,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tNUlosPI,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-17T23:07:04.151+0000)
>
> Agreed unfortunately what these players do a lot is surrender the game right before they win it thus ensuring that they can lower their MMR enough to play with people they can easily beat.

Nah, this shit happens even when your normal elo is high (actually especially when your normal elo is high). I'm D1/Master and probably like 1/4/-1/3 of my games are just randomly pre level 30 games. Pretty much made me quit playing normals.

(And no, I don't queue with anyone below 30 or low elo. And no I don't lose games on purpose or have a low normal MMR).

That or maybe they hit level 30 and IMMEDIATELY went to ranked.
Few or no normals thereafter would leave them sitting correctly at that normals mmr.

You guys did fine, there is a reason you where playing masters...

...Still a bit weird, but I mean... you won.
Dont have master tier skills in normals won't have this problem. No one low elo faces master person and gets a S rank on kassidin at level 23 and uses the same S ranked level 5 picture to complain.
The Nunu, a legit lvl 19 who had to lane against the master ...
MMR He proballly has good games this may not have been one of them
Obviously was a fair enough match.. because you won. :P

Obviously you don't know the already known thing most master and challenger players do in normals.

Go in, mess around to learn some new stuff, then surrender so their normal MMR stays low.

It has been done since forever lol
rite? wtf

I was the Karma that game jsyk. To all the people calling my two masters friends boosted or bad, that's not true. 
For one, the Malz was playing off role and a champion he doesn't play. We were all having fun trolling because it was a normal game. Even people in high elo do that. Not everyone is going to win every game. Ive played with a friend in normals that was challenger #80 and he still lost in norms sometimes when I played with him. Even to bronze and golds. It's not impossible. Just look at their ranked gameplay, when they are much more serious and playing their main roles and champions. You can't compare that to one normal game.

**This is why players lower than 30 should ONLY PLAY with and vs players lower than 30:**

Lv 3 to Lv15 vs Lv 3 to Lv15
Lv 15 to Lv 29 vs Lv 15 to Lv 29
Lv 30 vs Lv 30 (You cant inv players lower than 30)
I dislike this simply because it's the only way, other than me making a smurf, to play with a friend who is just starting. And if I make a smurf, I'm not suddenly going to have that same skill level.
how about they don't do a terrible idea like this. It'd be so much harder for friends to get their friends to play if they can't even play together.
Isn't that what ranked is for now? Does everything have to be about 'muh frendz'
since when can you play ranked with someone below level 30?
It's coming soon I'm sure lol

Honestly if the master players don't play normals much, their normal game mmr will be low, around that of a new level 30 if they jumped right into ranked. Even for myself, I get diamond tier players showing up in my aram games quite frequently due to my aram mmr being so much higher than my ranked or even normal mmr. Also, considering that you are on a smurf and hecarim as well it will increase your mmr to a level where it may have caused you to get into this match. I never checked the other players in the match but I'm also assuming that the other 3 players on their team were quite subpar and below your smurf account levels.

Our Nunu was a legit level 19 and did really bad against the Draven which is why Draven was so fed in the first place. All I want is rank to play a small role in normals matchmaking, that's all

EDIT: Not to mention that Malz had 973 normal wins and Draven had 760... how is that not many normal games?
Master tier jungler goes 5/10 against bronze/silver/unranked players. GG

He was just trying out Jungle Malza. He doesn't main Malza nor jungle. It's only normals.
Check his other matches and you'll see that he isn't that bad.

He doesn't jungle WutFace ?
Doesn't mean bc you're masters you can play every role xd
You still won, so I'm pretty sure the matchmaking is in a better situation than you give it credit for... Note there was also a Bronze 1 in the enemy team, that's not much better than an Unranked.
Problem was half our team wasn't even fully level 30. Yes 2 of our members were smurfs, but nunu wasnt

Yeah, you know what? From here that sounds like "I only want experienced players in my team, not in the enemy team". Why should you be able to have your unranked friend and yourself in the same team, but if the enemy team has good players like you, suddenly it's a problem?

Listen, I don't give a fuck about this game. I don't know why people can't understand that. Get it through your head already. My only reason for this post is to show how garbage this matchmaking system is in normals. No way in hell should low levels be matched against master tier players. I won the game, why would I say it's a problem? 

I'll repeat myself one more time for you. I don't give a fuck about this sole game. I'm not complaining about this game. I'm saying that the matchmaking in normals is stupid and this is proof.

This is no proof. Your unranked friend with 30-or-so wins was matched against a Bronze I with 20-something wins. And you, a Kassadin main playing his main champ, got matched against a Master player trying new stuff.

Would you say it's fair for someone of YOUR level to be matched against someone of YOUR FRIEND level? No, and yet you are still in the same team, so someone will be screwed no matter what. This is not the matchmaking being garbage, it's you ruining the matchmaking. You proved nothing. No-thing.

I thought you were complaining because I assumed you were smart enough to understand that this Bronze 1 guy's experience was no better than your friend's experience, that an experience gap can cut both ways. But apparently you're not complaining, you're just less smart than I assumed.

I don't main Kass. Look my stats up on here. 

What are you going on about? I already told you that this matchmaking doesn't matter to me personally, but it's BS that it's possible for new players to be matched with master level players with over 1k normal games. My smurf had like 20 games on it...

> Bronze 1 guy's experience was no better than your friend's experience,

The guy was Bronze 1. My friend was level 19 vs master level players. The bronze one guy was against a couple of unranked pre 30 players and a gold/silver player. How is that even remotely similar?

And BTW a level 19 cannot be compared to a bronze player. Bronze players are just much better.
Thank god they were just dicking around the entire time. The Master players, I mean.

I understand that the first thing that comes to your mind when you see this victory that the master players were messing around. However,  you could tell that the Draven was trying his ass off to win. Can't say much about the Malz
11 deaths on a master rank ADC? They weren't really trying.
those guys must be boosted lol.
definitely. got me xd

At least 1 of masters was obviously taking it slow..

(While master playing Draven was acting like your ordinary ADC - gotta get all kills.. huh)

Normal MMR is completely separate from ranked MMR

If all they do is troll in Normals then their Normal MMR is going to be low
They weren't trolling even in this game against low levels. Look at Draven's kills

wasnt trolling?
want the twitch vod? xd
https://www.twitch.tv/officialsilviu
itll be up there eventually
you trolled 1 time then you complained about someone not calling you important. good for you dude you showed them.
